title: Bacon, Cheddar & Jalapeño Pinwheels
directions: Mix cream cheese, bacon and jalapeños together in a small bowl and set aside.
Roll out crescent roll dough and lightly press seams together to form a sheet.
Layer ingredients evenly on the dough, reserving about 2 tablespoons of cheddar, and roll lengthwise.
Cut into 3/4" slices and place 2" apart on a foil- or parchment-lined cookie sheet. Top with reserved shredded cheddar, if desired.
Bake for 9-11 minutes, or until bread begins to brown.
Allow to cool slightly before plating and serving.
